name: Lethal Frame
description:
Enter Kamikura Village.

Two sisters found themselves trapped in the Lost Village. Armed with only the Camera Obscura, can you uncover the secrets of Kamikura Village and escape with your sister?

Inspired by TECMO's Fatal Frame series, this is a 2D point-and-click adventure game drawing heavy inspiration from Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly on PlayStation 2. The game is developed in around 50 hours which provides up to 1 hour of gameplay experience.

FATAL FRAME is a trademark and brand of KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD. LETHAL FRAME is not affiliated with KOEI TECMO in any way.
